title: Thunderbird Profiles can't be found
content: missing Thunderbird profiles: Thunderbird works on my windows 11 box but, ]\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles can't be found. I see others have the same issue, all recently uploaded as I am doing now, so something must have happened. None of the suggested fixes have helped. Has anyone come up with a strategy that works? Thanks for any help or direction.
creator: bonetree

title: cant send emails from my IMAP account. the other four email accounts works great. what gives on the IMAP account?
content: thunderbird did a upgrade again... now my 4 email account works great. but now my IMAP account will not let me send emails. i can receive them great... what gives? why does this happen? how can I fix this?
creator: ccperillo
